    • Method Detail

      • nearestPrototypesIn

        protected Pair<Prototype,Prototype> nearestPrototypesIn(PrototypeSet A,
                                                        PrototypeSet B,
                                                        MatrixOfDistances m)
        Returns the two nearest prototypes in two different sets.
        Parameters:
        A - Set which first prototype belongs to.
        B - Set which second prototype belongs to.
        m - matrix of distances.
        Returns:
        A pair which elements are the nearest prototypes in A and B (first and second, resp.).

      • maximumReduction

        protected PrototypeSet maximumReduction()
        Performs the maximum reduction of the training data set by the PNNGenerator (aka Chang) method.
        Returns:
        Reduced prototype set by Chang's method.

      • controlledReduction

        protected PrototypeSet controlledReduction()
        Performs a reduction of the training data set by the PNNGenerator (aka Chang) method. Stopped by reaching a specified number of prototypes.
        Returns:
        Reduced prototype set by Chang's method limited by the number of prototypes.

      • reduceSet

        public PrototypeSet reduceSet()
        Performs a reduction of the training data set by the PNNGenerator (aka Chang) method. It can use early stopping of the method.
        Overrides:
        reduceSet in class PrototypeGenerator
        Returns:
        Reduced prototype set by Chang's method limited by the number of prototypes.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        General main for all the prototoype generators Arguments: 0: Filename with the training data set to be condensed. 1: Filename wich contains the test data set. 3: Seed of the Random Number Generator. 4: number of prototypes to be generated (OPTIONAL)
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments of the main function.
